abstract: Discards all pending enqueued sample buffers.
overview:
## Discussion

It is not possible to determine which sample buffers have been decoded for video. The next frame passed to [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVQueuedSampleBufferRendering/enqueue(_:)] should be an IDR frame (also known as a key frame or sync sample).

# flush()

**Instance Method**

Discards all pending enqueued sample buffers.

## Declaration

```swift
func flush()
```

## Discussion

It is not possible to determine which sample buffers have been decoded for video. The next frame passed to [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVQueuedSampleBufferRendering/enqueue(_:)] should be an IDR frame (also known as a key frame or sync sample).
title: flush()
